name: my_website
description: A portfolio website showcasing my experience, projects, and skills as a Software Engineer.

scripts.build: npm run minify-html && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js && npm run copy-assets
scripts.minify-css: mkdirp dist/css && postcss ./src/css/*.css --use cssnano --no-map -d ./dist/css || echo Failed to minify CSS
scripts.minify-js: node minify-js.js || echo Failed to minify JS
